name: carrel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cubicle (= a small space that is separated off from a larger room) containing a desk for one person, often grouped together with other similar cubicles in a library, etc.: The centre has study rooms for groups and individual carrels.
Beau Lark/Corbis/VCG/Corbis/GettyImages
